text: The women's 7.5 km competitions in biathlon of the 2011 IPC Biathlon and Cross-Country Skiing World Championships were held on April 7, 2011. == Medals == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | bgcolor=efefef|Class||width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Sitting |Olena Iurkovska '''' |Lyudmyla Pavlenko '''' |Andrea Eskau '''' |- |Standing |Oleksandra Kononova '''' |Katarzyna Rogowiec '''' |Maija Loytynoja '''' |- |Visually impaired |Elena Remizova Guide: Natalia Yakimova '''' |Mikhalina Lysova Guide: Alexey Ivanov '''' |Tatiana Ilyuchenko Guide: Valery Koshkin '''' |} == Results == === Sitting === The women's 7.5 km, sitting.
